title: Follow Me On social Media
body: Like what you see on my page? You could follow me on your favourite Social Media Too!
Use the links below to Subscribe or Follow.

text.title: YouTube Channel - Heap Art
body: This is my original channel! Visit my channel to access weekly Origami Tutorials

text.title: YouTube Channel - Heap Art Coding
body: My video outlet for my Coding project demos!

text.title: Instagram - Wlee0515
body: Join me on Instagram to view Insta Pergfect Photos from my projects!

text.title: Tik Tok - Heap Art
body: Tik Tok, a place for busy people! Join me on Tik Tok to watch my short Origami tutorials (and other stuff)

text.title: 小红书 - Heap Art
body: I publish my short origami tutorials on 小红书 too!
